def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x,y,z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_x_smallest = is_smallest(x, [x,y,z], ctx)
        check_x_dark = is_dark(x, ctx)
        check_y_medium_gray = is_medium_size(y, ctx) and is_grey(y, ctx)
        check_y_on_top_x = is_above(y, x, ctx)
        check_z_largest = is_largest(z, [x,y,z], ctx)
        check_z_light_gray = is_light(z, ctx) and is_grey(z, ctx)
        if (
            check_x_smallest
            and check_x_dark
            and check_y_medium_gray
            and check_y_on_top_x
            and check_z_largest
            and check_z_light_gray
        ):
            results.append([x,y,z])
    return results
state = turn(state)

def select(state):
    # Select a dot.
    return state[0]
state = select(state)
